title: மாணவிகளை அடித்த ஏ.பி.வி.பி நபருடன் ரஜினி? - ஃபேஸ்புக்கில் பரபரப்பு
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Peace for Children: Foot soldier out on a mission to end begging BATHINDA: Ashish Sharma 27 yrs. The campaign,which began on August 22, will take at least a year to complete. During this period, the Delhi resident aims to walk 17,000 km across the length and breadth of India. pic.twitter.com/Ez3kIAnGdV
